nodes.text: Darth Sanguis was a male Sith Lord who, according to legend, traveled to Exegol seeking to learn the secrets of immortality. After achieving his goal, Darth Sanguis transformed into a creature over time. Eventually, Sanguis became a servant to Darth Noctyss when she arrived on Exegol, also seeking immortality. Noctyss sacrificed Sanguis in an immortality ritual, freeing him from a twisted life and dooming herself to a similar fate.
Darth Sanguis appeared in 2020 in "A Life Immortal," a story within the book Dark Legends, written and illustrated by George Mann and Grant Griffin, respectively.
